mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.MEMBER_BIR ,A.MEMBER_EMAIL ,A.MEMBER_ADD ,A.MEMBER_MENTAL ,A.MEMBER_NICK ,B.MEMBER_NO REF_MEMBER_NO ,B.AUTHORITY_NO REF_AUTHORITY_NO ,C.AUTHORITY_NO REF_AUTHORITY_NO2 , C.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_DESC FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER_ROLE B ON(A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTHORITY C ON(B.AUTHORITY_NO = C.AUTHORITY_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_EXIT = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_BIR, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADD, MEMBER_MENTAL, MEMBER_NICK) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{bir}, #{email}, #{add}, #{mental}, #{nick})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICK = #{nick}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_BIR, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_ADD, MEMBER_MENTAL, MEMBER_NICK FROM TBL_MEMBER

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PWD , A.MEMBER_BIR , A.MEMBER_EMAIL , A.MEMBER_ADD , A.MEMBER_MENTAL , A.MEMBER_NICK , B.MEMBER_NO REF_MEMBER_NO , B.AUTHORITY_NO REF_AUTHORITY_NO , C.AUTHORITY_NO REF_AUTHORITY_NO2 , C.AUTHORITY_NAME , C.AUTHORITY_DESC FROM TBL_MEMBER A LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER_ROLE B ON(A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTHORITY C ON(B.AUTHORITY_NO = C.AUTHORITY_NO) WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email}
